title: Planning for school effectiveness: program budgeting
brief_description: Explains school-based program budgeting using detailed examples of the highly effective approach at Rosebery District High School, Tasmania. Considers policy making and planning community and staff involvement, management of conflict, building consensus, and evaluation. No other credits available.
